snippet: UEFA punished three Eastern European clubs for racist behavior by fans.
abstract: UEFA punishes Eastern European soccer clubs Slovan Bratislava, Dynamo Moscow and Ruch Chorzow for racist behavior by fans.
lead_paragraph: UEFA punished three Eastern European clubs for racist behavior by fans.

headline.main: UEFA Punishes Clubs for Fan Racism
headline.print_headline: UEFA Punishes Clubs for Fan Racism
